decision_conditions: The proposed extensions by virtue of their size, siting and design would create an incongruous addition to the host property that would not be subordinate to or of an architectural style sympathetic to the host property and would detract from the character and appearance of the host property and cause harm to the character and appearance of the non designated heritage asset the Kingston Hill/Coombe Hill Strategic Area of special Character. The proposal would not accord with the NPPF and policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The applicant has failed to submit sufficient information to demonstrate that the proposed development would not cause harm to protected trees and as such the proposal does not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
description: Demolition of existing rear part of the main house, erection of single storey front and rear extension. First floor front balcony and roof extension with 1no front and 1 no rear dormer to facilitate loft conversion. Installation of solar panels. Fenestration alteration.
